lines.text: I'm a sea pig...
Slater is a dying breed. When she goes the whole species will be extinct.
My water bed got slashed to shreds and all you can do is joke about it. I swear she was trying to kill me.
Oh come on Vicki you deserved it, can't you fuck anywhere else.
You're the last one of your friends alive. You're the bait.
Here's to law school, may it be the three shortest years of my life.
Here's to reaching my full capacity.
A whole quarter of it.
Here's to my new employers at Pan Am, may they never find out I'm afraid of flying.
Here's to my mother who never let me forget that I was born with a silver spoon up my ass. But mother you were wrong, it's up my nose!
Here's to my sisters...
Oh come on!
No seriously, here's to my sisters without whom I wouldn't be what I am today... wasted!
Alright Morgan, now we understand this takes a lot of thinking Morgan...
Here's to...
[begins to throw up within mouth]
If that gun is real all you girls are going to be in real trouble.
Can you actually believe what we're talking about!
He must of seen it all from the attic window.
Brad! Hey... Brad?
Does that mean she could still be alive?
Kathryn listen to Vicki for once.
It's already too late now.
You're all a bunch of cowards!
Is it loaded?

[as she passes the gun over]
Of course not

[as Stevie takes the gun]
BANG!
